text: Machine learning is a method of data analysis that automates analytical model building. It is a branch of artificial intelligence based on the idea that systems can learn from data, identify patterns and make decisions with minimal human intervention.
summary: Machine learning uses AI to analyze data and make decisions automatically.

text: The Eiffel Tower is one of the most recognizable structures in the world and is located in Paris, France. It was completed in 1889 as the entrance arch to the 1889 World's Fair.
summary: The Eiffel Tower is a famous Paris landmark built for the 1889 World's Fair.
